name: tpsuni
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, ctps), wceq(c1, cuni(c2)), wcel(c2, ctop))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ TopSp, c1 = ⋃ c2, c2 ∈ Top)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctps), wceq(c1, cuni(c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c2, ctop), wceq(c1, cuni(c2))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp → c1 = ⋃ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔(c2 ∈ Top ∧ c1 = ⋃ c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctps), wceq(c1, cuni(c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c2, ctop), wceq(c1, cuni(c2))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp → c1 = ⋃ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔(c2 ∈ Top ∧ c1 = ⋃ c2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c2, ctop), wceq(c1, cuni(c2))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔(c2 ∈ Top ∧ c1 = ⋃ c2))
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctps), wceq(c1, cuni(c2)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp → c1 = ⋃ c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)

comment: The base set of a topological space. (Contributed by FL, 27-Jun-2014.)
